scripts.test: docker exec -i planit_api python -m pytest api -W ignore::DeprecationWarning
scripts.app-lint: docker exec -t planit_app npm run lint
scripts.app-prettier: docker exec -t planit_app npm run prettier
scripts.api-lint: docker exec -t planit_api python -m flake8 --ignore F401,E402,E501,W503 ./api
scripts.lint: npm run app-lint && npm run api-lint
scripts.prettier: npm run app-prettier && npm run api-prettier
